• Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LA9633-4Present
    LA9634-2Absent

name: PhenotypicFeatureStatusValueSet
title: Observation Codes for status of a PhenotypicFeature
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

contact.name: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

description: The LOINC codes for present if a feature is observed and absent if a feature was excluded.
